title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: La Crosse, Wisconsin
content:
Photo submitted by Chris Stindt, “Early spring riding in Wisconsin means trying to use all the daylight you can before it quickly disappears. There is a road outside La Crosse, WI, where they hand cut a section of rock to allow traffic to pass.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: La Crosse, Wisconsin appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
